experience.title: January - April, 2023
cardDetailedText: • Developed RESTful API with Java Spring Boot to support modernization of MTO's Licensing Control System
• Performed unit and integration testing using JUnit and Postman with high code coverage to track and maintain functionality
• Initiated CI/CD pipeline using Azure Pipelines and Maven to automate the build and deployment process
• Tracked and managed project progress using Azure DevOps to ensure clear understanding of tasks and deadlines among team members
